category: Articles of Incorporation/Article 16 (Function of General Meeting)
contents: Article 16 (Functions of the general meeting) The general meeting deliberates and decides on the following matters: 1. Matters related to the dissolution of the Sports Association and changes to the articles of incorporation, 2. Admission, demotion, and expulsion of regular member organizations â€‹Amended on April 2, 2018. , 3. Matters related to the appointment and dismissal of executives, 4. Matters related to business results and settlement of accounts (including annual reports and audited financial statements), 5. Other important matters
